content: simple chair sock crochet materials 3 5mm 4mm crochet hook worsted weight yarn abbreviations blo - back loop only fo - finish off magic_ring - magic_ring round - round single_crochet - single_crochet decrease - single_crochet 2 stitches together st - stitch pattern round 1 6sc in magic_ring 6 place marker on 1st stitch and move marker to 1st stitch on each round round 2 2 single_crochet in each st 12 round 3 1 single_crochet 2sc in next st repeat to end of round 18 round 4 2 single_crochet 2sc in next st repeat to end of round 24 round 5 5sc 2sc in next st repeat to end of round 28 round 6 in back loops only blo 28 single_crochet round 7-12 single_crochet 28 for taller socks repeat more rounds round 13 single_crochet until 2 before marker decrease 27 round 14 single_crochet 27 fo and weave in tail pattern and images copyright january 2020 janet helman all rights reserved pattern for personal use only
